page.title: Olympic Champion Massu Finally Wins in Vienna
page.text: <p></p><p> By Barry Wood</p><p> VIENNA (Reuters) - Double Olympic champion Nicolas Massubattled for nearly three hours before overcoming Slovakqualifier Karol Kucera 6-4, 6-7, 6-4 Tuesday to claim his firstvictory in four attempts at the Vienna Trophy.</p>
